text: to kya jo pratyek praanee ke karatoot se avagat hai aur unhonne us (allaah) ka saajhee bana liya hai, aap kahie ki unake naam batao ya tum use us cheez se soochit kar rahe ho, jise vah dharatee mein nahin jaanata ya ochhee baat[1] karate ho? balki kaafiron ke lie unake chhal sushobhit bana diye gaye hain aur seedhee raah se rok diye gaye hain aur jise allaah kupath kar de, to use koee raah dikhaane vaala nahin
